TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit ReadOnlyCollectionBase extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public MustInherit Class ReadOnlyCollectionBase Implements ICollection
public ref class ReadOnlyCollectionBase abstract : System::Collections::ICollection
type ReadOnlyCollectionBase = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供强类型化非泛型只读集合的 基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for a strongly typed non-generic read-only collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个实例始终是只读的。A instance is always read-only. 请参阅有关的此类可修改版本。See for a modifiable version of this class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 我们不建议你使用`ReadOnlyCollectionBase`类的新的开发。We don't recommend that you use the `ReadOnlyCollectionBase` class for new development. 相反，我们建议使用泛型类。Instead, we recommend that you use the generic class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[不应使用非泛型集合](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md)GitHub 上。For more information, see [Non-generic collections shouldn't be used](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md) on GitHub. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类。The following code example implements the class. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CPP/readonlycollectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CS/readonlycollectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/VB/readonlycollectionbase.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公共静态 (在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员是线程安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此实现不提供同步 （线程安全） 包装器，但是，派生的类可以创建他们自己的同步的版本使用属性。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

para.span: 此基类提供轻松实现器来创建强类型化只读的自定义集合。

span.span: This base class is provided to make it easier for implementers to create a strongly typed read-only custom collection.

para.span: 建议来扩展此基类而不是创建其自己的实施者。

span.span: Implementers are encouraged to extend this base class instead of creating their own.

para.span: 此基类的成员受到保护，并且可用于通过派生类使用。

span.span: Members of this base class are protected and are intended to be used through a derived class only.

para.span: 此类可通过提供基础集合属性，它仅供直接派生自的类。

span.span: This class makes the underlying collection available through the property, which is intended for use only by classes that are derived directly from .

para.span: 在派生的类必须确保其自己的用户不能修改基础集合。

span.span: The derived class must ensure that its own users cannot modify the underlying collection.

summary.span: 返回循环访问 实例的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the instance.
An for the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现类。The following code example implements the class. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CPP/readonlycollectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CS/readonlycollectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/VB/readonlycollectionbase.vb#1)]

span.span: This class makes the underlying collection available through the property, which is intended for use only by classes that are derived directly from .

para.span: 在派生的类必须确保其自己的用户不能修改基础集合。

span.span: The derived class must ensure that its own users cannot modify the underlying collection.

param.span: array 中从零开始的索引，在此处开始复制。

span.span: The zero-based index in array at which copying begins.

summary.span: 从目标数组的指定索引处开始将整个 复制到兼容的一维 。

span.span: Copies the entire to a compatible one-dimensional , starting at the specified index of the target array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的数组必须具有兼容类型。The specified array must be of a compatible type. 此方法使用元素将复制到。This method uses to copy the elements. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

span.span: is .
is less than zero.
is multidimensional.
-or-

exception.span: 源 中的元素个数大于从 到目标 末尾之间的可用空间。

span.span: The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from to the end of the destination .

exception.span: 无法自动将源 的类型转换为目标 的类型。

span.span: The type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination .

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示对 对象的访问是否同步（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to a object is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 对象的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the object is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象不同步。A object is not synchronized. 派生的类可以提供的同步的版本类使用属性。Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the class using the property. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用属性在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the property during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/VB/source2.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot

summary.span: 获取一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to a object.

value.span: 一个对象，该对象可用于同步对 对象的访问。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类可以提供其自己的同步的版本类使用属性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the class using the property. 同步代码必须在执行操作的属性对象，不是直接在对象。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the property of the object, not directly on the object. 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它维护与其他线程可能同时对修改的正确同步对象。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用属性在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the property during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase/VB/source2.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
